name: insightcards
description: Portfolio oriented project to display my skills as fullstack developer, here the cumberstones will be sass, backend tecnologies for api as javaspring and lavarel and frontend tecnologies for front-end components and rendering like react, vue, svelte and emberjs. My goal here is stablish well documented and coded files for a rather simple logical project that stills is a useful for me, so I will have the maximium motivation, minimium stress and maxed professionalism. All this while working during day and researching the parts that I have to learn still.
